title: Thread-safe memory copy
summary: Copying memory in multi-threaded environments can lead to unpredictable results if one thread modifies the data while another is copying it. To avoid crashes and undefined behavior, programmers can implement safe memory copy functions using atomic operations, though this may result in slower performance.
